document_data.name: Lightning Arrow
document_data.Effects: This spell turned a weapon into a bolt of lightning. It only functioned with a ranged weapon, either the missile of one, such as an arrow, or the weapon itself, such as a throwing axe. When the spell expired, the weapon returned to its normal state. When the weapon struck a target, every creature within 10 feet (3 meters) suffered electrical damage.
document_data.Components: This spell required [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
